channel.title: CVE Feed for boldgrid -- Total Upkeep – WordPress Backup Plugin plus Restore & Migrate by BoldGrid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for boldgrid -- Total Upkeep – WordPress Backup Plugin plus Restore & Migrate by BoldGrid

item.title: CVE-2022-4932|2024-08-03T01:55:46.036Z -- boldgrid -- total%20upkeep%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20backup%20plugin%20plus%20restore%20%26%20migrate%20by%20boldgrid
item.description: The Total Upkeep plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to information disclosure in versions up to, and including 1.14.13. This is due to missing authorization on the heartbeat_received() function that triggers on WordPress heartbeat. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above to retrieve back-up paths that can subsequently be used to download the back-up.
